name: Eiichiro Oda Inu
description: Eiichiro Oda Inu is inspired by the mastermind of the best-selling manga/anime series called One Piece. As we join ODA on the Ethereum blockchain, we join a strong community that work towards a singular effort of expanding the utility behind the token. Oda's objectives is based on components of key transparency, strong development, and active community building. In the future, we plan to implement staking, NFT development, and blockchain development. We plan to improve the current infrastructure and create our own chain called Oda Chain.
